subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Aaron Craft hit the go-ahead 3-pointer with five-tenths of a second remaining to lift Ohio State over Iowa State — giving an already wild N.C.A.A. tournament another memorable moment.
snippet: Aaron Craft hit the go-ahead 3-pointer with five-tenths of a second remaining to lift Ohio State over Iowa State — giving an already wild N.C.A.A. tournament another memorable moment.
